channel.title: Shane Connuck's Site
channel.description: Recent content on Shane Connuck's Site

item.title: Kevin Willard Teams
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.5 ## ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.9 ## ✔ tidyr 1.2.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.1 ## ✔ readr 2.1.2 ✔ forcats 0.5.2 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() cbb <- read.csv("https://dwillis.github.io/sports-data-files/logs1222.csv") shu <- cbb %>% filter(TeamFull == "Seton Hall Pirates") md <- cbb %>% filter(TeamFull == "Maryland Terrapins") That created dataframes with only Seton Hall’s and Maryland’s stats, respectively.

item.title: Are college teams passing more on first down?
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(cfbfastR) library(ggalt) tictoc::tic() pbp <- data.frame() seasons <- 2014:cfbfastR:::most_recent_cfb_season() progressr::with_progress({ pbp <- cfbfastR::load_cfb_pbp(seasons) }) tictoc::toc() ## 84.565 sec elapsed The following code creates a new dataframe for all passing plays on first down, grouped by the team and year. pass_plays <- pbp %>% filter(pass == 1) %>% filter(down == 1) %>% group_by(pos_team, year) %>% summarise(plays = n()) ## `summarise()` has grouped output by 'pos_team'. You can override using the ## `.

item.title: Maryland Football YPP
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.5 ## ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.9 ## ✔ tidyr 1.2.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.1 ## ✔ readr 2.1.2 ✔ forcats 0.5.2 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggrepel) As the clock ran out on Saturday at SECU Stadium, it was the earliest time in more than 20 years that Maryland fans smelled bowl eligibility.
